FuncDef: This command enables BRG processing on the specified RADIUS proxy server. Whenever an Access-Accept is received with the attribute Alc-BRG-Id present, this will trigger the creation of a BRG. The BRG will use the brg-profile specified in Access-Accept or otherwise fall-back to this brg-profile. When the specified radius-proxy-server has a cache enabled, no cache entries will be created for a transaction identified as BRG. A RADIUS proxy server can only be listed in one brg-profile.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the ID of the VRF where the proxy server is located.
Specifies the name of the RADIUS proxy server.
